column1: # "nsspf" remix - contains all mushrooms, fungi and truffles from the "nsspf" (Not So Simple Plants
#       and Fungi) mod, but their behaviour has been changed in order to drastically improve the
# Mushrooms/fungi growing on the ground now behave like minetest_game mushrooms (i.e. they are
#       spreadable). Other mushrooms/fungi tend to grow on trees, and are not spreadable or
#       placeable. Truffles can be found growing at the base of some trees, just below the surface.
#       Spores have not been imported at all
# See the STANDARDS file for more information about what belongs in each category, and what does not
